panel.title: DDoS Attack Prevented by PaloAlto Firewall

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:threat" log_subtype=packet | stats count, values(signature) as signature, values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(src_location) as src_location, dc(dest) as dc_dest, values(action) as action by src | sort - count | `cs_palo_ddos_prevented_filter`

html.p: Description: PaloAlto Firewall prevented DDoS attack. It searches for log_subtype=packet.
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:traffic sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:system" signature="auth-fail" object IN ("Local", "Local_Users") | rex "failed authentication for user \'(?<user>.*)\'\." | rex " From: (?<src>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | stats count values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(src) as src by user | sort - count | `cs_palo_firewall_login_failure_filter`

html.p: Description: PaloAlto Firewall Logins on Local and Local_Users profile.
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:system sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:traffic" action="allowed" `cs_filter_private_ips` packets_in>0 | lookup ip_blocked_list ip as src_ip OUTPUT blocked | search blocked=1 | stats count, values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, dc(src_port) as dc_src_port, dc(dest_ip) as dc_dest_ip, values(dest_port) as dest_port by src_ip | sort -count | `cs_palo_blocked_ip_inbound_filter`

html.p: Description: Traffic coming from blocked IPs. The ip_blocked_list lookup is being used to identify the blocked IPs.
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:traffic sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:traffic" action="allowed" `cs_filter_private_ips` packets_out>0 | lookup ip_blocked_list ip as src_ip OUTPUT blocked | search blocked=1 | stats count, values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, dc(dest_port) as dc_dest_port, dc(src_ip) as dc_src_ip, dc(src_port) as dc_src_port by dest_ip | sort -count | `cs_palo_blocked_ip_outbound_filter`

html.p: Description: Traffic going to blocked IPs. The ip_blocked_list lookup is being used to identify the blocked IPs.
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:traffic sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)
